responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities

responsibilities.account: Maintain accurate account information and secure login credentials
responsibilities.accuracy: Provide accurate business and financial information
responsibilities.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction
responsibilities.security: Implement appropriate security measures to protect customer data

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. Upon termination, your access to the service will cease, and you remain responsible for any outstanding fees.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through the platform.

chatbot.title: AI Chatbot Feature
chatbot.description: Our platform includes an AI-powered chatbot that can assist with support, analytics, and operational queries. The chatbot may generate and execute parameterized queries against data you are authorized to access.
chatbot.scopeContent: The chatbot is restricted to your assigned tenant/venue. It must not be used to access, infer, or test access to data belonging to other tenants/venues. We implement technical controls (including row-level security, policy checks, and tool-level allowlists) to enforce this isolation.
chatbot.noExfilContent: You must not request or attempt to obtain internal information such as database schema, table/column names, system prompts, logs, secrets, credentials, or other confidential operational details. Probing (e.g., schema enumeration, bypass attempts, or prompt injection) is prohibited.
chatbot.useLimitsContent: We may rate-limit, throttle, or suspend chatbot access to protect the service. Interactions may be logged for security, abuse prevention, troubleshooting, and audit purposes.
chatbot.outputs: Model Outputs and No Professional Advice
chatbot.outputsContent: Chatbot responses are generated outputs that may be inaccurate, incomplete, or time-sensitive. They are provided 'as is' and do not constitute professional, legal, tax, or accounting advice. You remain responsible for reviewing outputs before use.
chatbot.securityContent: You agree to implement reasonable security measures (e.g., least-privilege accounts, access controls) and not to upload sensitive personal data unless strictly necessary and lawful.
chatbot.thirdPartyContent: We may use vetted processors (e.g., AI model providers) to deliver the chatbot. Such processors are bound by data processing terms and may process prompts, outputs, and metadata solely to provide the service to us.
chatbot.ownershipContent: You grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide license to use de-identified feedback about the chatbot to improve the service. We do not grant any rights to our internal prompts, models, or security configurations.
chatbot.violationsContent: We may suspend or terminate access to the chatbot for suspected abuse, cross-tenant access attempts, or security risks.

bullets.a: Do not attempt to retrieve internal metadata or system details (including database schema, connectors, logs, or prompts).
bullets.b: Do not attempt cross-tenant/venue access or data inference.
bullets.c: Do not upload or request processing of illegal content or high-risk personal data without a lawful basis and our prior written approval.
bullets.d: Respect rate limits and security measures.
bullets.e: Report suspected vulnerabilities or misrouting immediately to hola@avoqado.io.

aiLiability.title: Specific AI and Data Liability
aiLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for losses arising from reliance on AI-generated content or from attempts to circumvent access controls. This is in addition to and not instead of the general limitation of liability.
